actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend protection to Veterans' Administration health care personnel from suits alleging the commission of certain torts during the furnishing of medical care or treatment.

summary.text: Extends protection from certain malpractice suits to health care personnel of the Department of Medicine and Surgery of the Veterans Administration.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend protection to Veterans' Administration health care personnel from suits alleging the commission of certain torts during the furnishing of medical care or treatment.
